content:
I'm seeing this notice quite a bit in the Backdrop Forum site logs:

Notice: A non well formed numeric value encountered in views_plugin_pager_full->query() (line 266 of /home/forum/repo/www/core/modules/views/plugins/views_plugin_pager_full.inc).

Anyone come across that before?

Already part of this issue: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/3853

Drupal fix not yet ported. Drupal issue

crossport views commits from 7.x-3.22 - 7.x-3.23 路 Issue #3853 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
Has separate issues/PRs: #4075 | e19e3546 | Issue #2900405 by collinhaines, jenlampton, sano, paulbeaney, jyraya: Undefined index in views_handler_filter->store_exposed_input(). #4075 | ddaeddc3...
My goodness! Issues like that scare me.
Meh, the porting of the fixes is straight-forward. Just takes time/effort.
